dct_title_s: Map showing the survey of lands under the waters of the Hudson River and Bay of New York and of lands adjacent thereto
dct_description_sm: Riparian map of the Hudson River, featuring the waterfront road and railway system from Hoboken in Hudson County to Harrinton Township, Bergen County
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Map is a tracing, made in 1920 of an original created in 1865
